mapper.insert: insert into t_sjlaiyuan (sjlaiyuanId, sjlaiyuanName, sjlaiyuanMark, sjlaiyuanMark1, sjlaiyuanMark2, sjlaiyuanPhone, sjlaiyuanDizhi, sjlaiyuanDate, sjlaiyuanDate1, sjlaiyuanType, sjlaiyuanType1, sjlaiyuanDouble, sjlaiyuanDouble1) values (#{sjlaiyuanId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sjlaiyuanName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sjlaiyuanMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sjlaiyuanMark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sjlaiyuanMark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sjlaiyuanPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sjlaiyuanDizhi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sjlaiyuanDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sjlaiyuanDate1,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sjlaiyuanType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sjlaiyuanType1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sjlaiyuanDouble,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{sjlaiyuanDouble1,jdbcType=DOUBLE})
mapper.update: update t_sjlaiyuan set sjlaiyuanName = #{sjlaiyuanName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sjlaiyuanMark = #{sjlaiyuanMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sjlaiyuanMark1 = #{sjlaiyuanMark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sjlaiyuanMark2 = #{sjlaiyuanMark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sjlaiyuanPhone = #{sjlaiyuanPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sjlaiyuanDizhi = #{sjlaiyuanDizhi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sjlaiyuanDate = #{sjlaiyuanDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sjlaiyuanDate1 = #{sjlaiyuanDate1,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sjlaiyuanType = #{sjlaiyuanType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sjlaiyuanType1 = #{sjlaiyuanType1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sjlaiyuanDouble = #{sjlaiyuanDouble,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, sjlaiyuanDouble1 = #{sjlaiyuanDouble1,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where sjlaiyuanId = #{sjlaiyuanId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select sjlaiyuanId, sjlaiyuanName, sjlaiyuanMark, sjlaiyuanMark1, sjlaiyuanMark2, sjlaiyuanPhone, sjlaiyuanDizhi, sjlaiyuanDate, sjlaiyuanDate1, sjlaiyuanType, sjlaiyuanType1, sjlaiyuanDouble, sjlaiyuanDouble1 from t_sjlaiyuan where sjlaiyuanId = #{sjlaiyuanId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
